1370: Poppo moved to Bloemendaelse straet.D.4 after marriage.
Got married to Ymmekine at age 29 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Ymmekine, Ymmekine, at age 29.
1372: Had a son with Ymmekine, Henric, at age 31.
1375: Had a daughter with Ymmekine, Moerseil, at age 34.
Lost daughter Ymmekine when Ymmekine was 6 years old.
1380: Had a daughter with Ymmekine, Tetta, at age 39.
1381: Lost his wife Ymmekine while she was giving birth to Rase in 1381.
Became caretaker of Henric, Moerseil, Tetta, Rase at age 41.
